Most women aren't victims in NTR stories, they are active (willing) participants. stupid things like blackmail (or a sudden addiction to massive cocks) are just a flimsy excuses to save face in the event infidelity is ever discovered or made public. ultimately the women want to engauge in guilt free "forbiden" sex and pleasure while (sometimes) harboring passive aggressive feelings (even outright resentment) for all the men in their lives (including their own male children... depending on the story). NTR just like the cuckold fetish, is really another form of femdom.

I am a cursed vanilla lover, and the only reason, I found to be able to handle this is to simply not follow the intent of the NTR tag. The purpose of NTR is to place YOU the reader in the 'pathetic, beta-male, blue-ball, xxxs penis' position, placing a tantalizing figure of a woman 'you' are in a relationship with, and having the idealized 'man' take her away from you. This creates a feeling of inferiority and fury as the 'lesser man', now forget that guy and simply imagine yourself as the Alpha Male here doing the NTR instead to the poor sod over here.
I'm no psychologist, but damn, as long as the girl ain't too physically abused beyond her limit, it's actually pretty good to read up NTR.
In other words, go self-insert yourself on the other character.
